dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Title in upper margin: Accurata totius Archipelagi et Græciæ universæ tabula / per R. & I. Ottens geogr. Probably issued in: Atlas minor sive Geographia compendiosa in qua orbis terrarum paucis attamen novissimis tabulis ostenditur = Atlas nouveau, contenant toutes les parties du monde ... A Amsterdam : chez Regner & Josue Ottens, 1725-1750.
dct_publisher_sm: A Amsterdam : Chez R. & I. Ottens, geographes between 1725 and 1750]
